Text.Page: You helped the tuwangis and joined in the Pond Faire.

Pond Faire is a ceremony for tuwangis turning seven years old. The tuwangi rituals are surprisingly complicated for such a simple species!

Speak to the shaman, Haroso. Perhaps he'll let you observe the young tuwangis, or even join in. Okay.
Young tuwangi have fear. Hiding now. Must find. Must make brave! <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>How can I help?</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Haroso give drum.
Bang, bang drum! Hit drum to make tuwangi brave.

Find tuwangi! Bang drum. Make brave.

Thank you! You work hard. We feast!

Big feast for your work! I didnâ€™t do that much.
You bring feast! Bring dragon meat! All tuwangis feast! Dragon meat best!
